meanings.definition: A mother who excels in managing her household and caring for her children.
meanings.sent1: The supermoms in our neighborhood always have everything organized and clean.
meanings.sent2: I look up to supermoms who can juggle work and family responsibilities effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The supermoms at the park made packing snacks and toys look like a fun game.
meanings.sent4: She was like a superhero, swooping in to save the day - a true supermom.
meanings.sent5: The image of supermoms with capes flying in the wind stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Mothers who possess exceptional abilities or qualities in parenting.
meanings.sent1: These supermoms always know the right thing to say to comfort their children.
meanings.sent2: I admire how supermoms can handle any parenting challenge with grace and patience.
meanings.sent3: The supermoms at the school event had a magical touch that calmed all the kids.
meanings.sent4: She was a beacon of strength and wisdom among the other parents - a true supermom.
meanings.sent5: The supermoms' nurturing nature shone brightly in the community.

meanings.definition: Mothers who are admired for their dedication and effectiveness in raising their children.
meanings.sent1: The supermoms in the support group shared valuable tips on parenting.
meanings.sent2: Being a supermom is not about being perfect but about being there for your kids.
meanings.sent3: The supermoms' secret weapon was their ability to turn any situation into a learning opportunity.
meanings.sent4: She was the unsung hero of the neighborhood, quietly being a supermom to all.
meanings.sent5: The supermoms' love and care created a warm and nurturing environment for all.
